lines:
I Janary. 2009

A S. S. Kwan,

Cambridge. He 
My Acar Kwan: -
I have your letter this merning, signed by you and Ink, eng 
I ensless cheoke tar tan dollara cach, a réquested. Good luck to you 
bath, ang the happiest kind of a New Year,

I have received a number of bilis sings you lei, undah I have 
net feit justified in paying until I could talk, they over with you. I 
suppose you will be out again in a day or tws, and hence I shall wait 
until that time

Sinsurely you

Principai

e anels

Good luck to you bath, ang the happiest kind of a New Year, I have received a number of bilis sings you lei, undah I have net feit justified in paying until I could talk, they over with you. I suppose you will be out again in a day or tws, and hence I shall wait until that time Sinsurely you Principai e anels

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter enclosing the $10 for S.S. Kwan and S.C. Luk in response to their postcard. Stearns requests a meeting after the New year to discuss authorizing bills received.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
